Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires businesses that purchase silver, gold and platinum to display current silver, gold and platinum prices
Summary: Requires businesses that purchase silver, gold and platinum to display current silver, gold and platinum prices.
LawCode: Add ยง391-v, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring businesses that purchase silver, gold and platinum to display current silver, gold and platinum prices
